title: "New deep learning AI tool helps ecologists monitor rare birds through their songs"
excerpt: "Researchers have developed a new deep learning AI tool that generates lifelike bird songs to train bird identification tools, helping ecologists to monitor rare species in the wild. The findings are presented in Methods in Ecology and Evolution."
